noun.description: The property or quality of being black in color.
examples: it restores gray hair to blackness

noun.description: The fact or state of belonging to any human group having dark-colored skin.
examples: my experiences have made me far more aware of my blackness than ever before
she holds that position not because of her blackness, but her effectiveness

noun.description: A state characterized by despair or depression.
examples: there is a little hope amid the blackness of his life
the absolute depths of blackness and morbidity
